subject: Re: UPDATED BROCHURES For MET;s Website
preview: Hi Ingrid, Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. Here are the link: https://mets.edu.au/courses/sir30216-certificate-iii

full_threads.body:
Hi Ingrid, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the link: 
https://mets.edu.au/courses/sir30216-certificate-iii-in-retail/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/sir20216-certificate-ii-in-retail-services/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/chcprt00-identify-and-respond-to-children-and-young-people-at-risk/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/chc50121-diploma-of-early-childhood-education-and-care/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/chc30121-certificate-iii-in-early-childhood-education-and-care/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/bsb4052-certificate-iv-in-leadership-and-management/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/bsb20120-certificate-ii-workplace-skills/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/chc43121-certificate-iv-in-disability/
https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=1026&action=edit (currently save as draft)

Please note that https://mets.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/METs-Brochure-Cert-III-Indv-Sup-Ageing-1-Ingrid-Powell.pdf has no existing page/course.

Let us know if you would like further changes.

Hi @rica done updating courses

admin link: https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=courses

Add Brochure button (note, some of the courses has no brochure and button will not show up - Done
Courses: https://mets.edu.au/courses/chc43121-certificate-iv-in-disability/
Screenshot


Time: +45mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi @rica can you please help me with some updates on https://mets.edu.au/ ?

Ingrid has uploaded some updated brochures here: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/vlnip976ria3h6rpe5u0c/h?rlkey=6nou79ex1q2qcv9lhd0irnkpw&st=mujfe5sb&dl=0

The file names correspond with a course which was created using a custom post. Please let me know if you need a hand!

Hi Chris,

I have uploaded the brochures.

I think they just need to replace the current ones that that are currently on the site.

Please let me know if you have any issues at all and provide and ETA on completion.

Kind Regards,

Ingrid

Ingrid Powell
Digital Marketing ManagerScope (Aust) Ltd1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673



Working Days: Monday Tuesday Thursday Friday

Hi Ingrid, 

As promised, you can upload the brochures here: https://www.dropbox.com/request/tNkGyorJluhVGjDEQqxG

I have also created a Google Doc where updates can be tracked: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1u1aa_PqClAAcKTZ5Lf0p5U-n8U1rfUiOUYcZcXdH2Gg/edit?usp=sharing

Please let me know once we can start on the updates.
@chris FYI for your action please

Hi Ingrid,

Yes sure, no problems. Chris will send you over a link our DropBox to add the files to shortly (the Microsoft link is not working for us). You can then let us know where you want them loaded and we will get right to it.

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Hope you have been well.


Just wondering if you would be able to help with uploading new brochures to the MET's website? I no longer have Evangeline or Leanne so behind a little.


Happy to discuss this over a zoom call if need be?


Thanks,


Ingrid




Ingrid Powell
Digital Marketing Manager
Scope (Aust) Ltd
1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673
